definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: What happens in disputes between direct buyer and seller?
sentences.chinese: 直接购买者与出售者之间发生哪些争端？

sentences.english: We must figure out a way to settle the dispute.
sentences.chinese: 我们想个办法解决这个争端。

sentences.english: The dispute was settled by mediation of the third country.
sentences.chinese: 这场争端通过第三国的斡旋而得以解决。

sentences.english: The DAB shall be deemed to be not acting as arbitrator(s).
sentences.chinese: 争端裁决委员不应被视为作为仲裁人。

sentences.english: We have consistently called for settling international disputes by peaceful means and opposed the use of force.
sentences.chinese: 我们一贯主张和平解决国际争端，反对使用武力。

sentences.english: They rushed clamorously into the presence of the lioness, and demanded of her the settlement of the dispute.
sentences.chinese: 他们吵吵嚷嚷，跑到母狮面前，请她解决争端。

sentences.english: He never gets involved in unprincipled disputes.
sentences.chinese: 他从不介入无原则的争端。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the chances of an Israeli-Palestinian settlement are as remote as ever.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，平定巴以争端的可能性还是微乎其微。

sentences.english: And if you stir up anger you will get strife.
sentences.chinese: 如果你惹气，就会得著争端。

sentences.english: Chapter Two focus on the Amicus Curiae in NAFTA investment dispute settlement mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，NAFTA投资争端解决机制中的法庭之友。

sentences.english: One day, it might become a forum for settling disputes.
sentences.chinese: 有朝一日它可能会成为解决争端的论坛。
争端的结果是一场战争。

sentences.english: The dispute was settled by mediation.
sentences.chinese: 这场争端通过调停而得到解决。

sentences.english: The dispute was touched off by the dismissal of a workman for insubordination.
sentences.chinese: 这次争端是由解雇一名不服从命令的工人引起的。

sentences.english: Land disputes became overheated and were frequently resolved at the point of a gun.
sentences.chinese: 土地争端变得火爆异常，而且基本上是枪杆子说了算。

sentences.english: But the footwear dispute could overshadow those successes.
sentences.chinese: 但鞋类争端却可能给上述成绩蒙上阴影。

definition: conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
to dispute/to disagree/to argue opinionatedly/to wrangle
internal strife/power struggle/(of members of an organization) to fight each other
to become enemies/to become hostile towards
an old grudge/old scores to settle
